faqContent.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqContent.subheading: Need help with something? Here are our most frequently asked questions.

actionBox.title: Still have a question?
actionBox.description: We'd be happy to help you with any questions you have! Please let us know what you're looking for, and we'll do our best to assist you.

faq.question: Can I send bulk messages to WhatsApp groups?
faq.answer: Yes, our broadcasting tool allows you to send bulk and personalized messages directly to WhatsApp groups.

faq.question: Can I schedule messages in advance?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can schedule messages to be sent at specific times using the broadcasting scheduler.

faq.question: How does the AI-powered template feature work?
faq.answer: Our AI analyzes your needs and generates message templates automatically, or you can choose from ready-to-use default templates.

faq.question: Can I import and manage contacts easily?
faq.answer: Yes, you can import contacts from CSV or Google Sheets, label them, and integrate with CRM platforms for streamlined management.

faq.question: Is there a way to validate WhatsApp numbers before messaging?
faq.answer: Yes, the WhatsApp number validator checks the authenticity of numbers before you send messages.

faq.question: Does the system support media and file attachments?
faq.answer: Yes, you can send images, videos, documents, emojis, and GIFs as part of your messages.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Your privacy is our priority. All contacts and broadcasts are stored securely with strong privacy controls in place.
